author: kaushalye
msg: Applying patch-2-2.txt in Jira AXIS2C-488.

author: jta
msg: DERBY-2237 (partial) Corrects the Copyright page and adds a license page to
the Derby manuals.  Specific changes for each book include:
1) Add a new <book>license.dita file with the text of the Apache License,
Version 2.0.
2) <book>.ditamap: Adds a License entry below the Copyright entry, which is
linked to <book>license.dita.
3) <book>copyright.dita: Corrects the Copyright line and notice.
4) <book>copyright.dita: A new "Related information" section links to
<book>license.dita, except for Working With Derby. WWD already has an
automatically generated "Next topic" which links to the License because of
its position in the ditamap; however, only in the html, not the PDF. I'll
post a followup note to derby-dev.
This commit updates the English manuals; still need to do Brazilian Portuguese
and Japanese.

author: jford
msg: Modified xml files to conform to schema

author: dblevins
msg: Refactored out the parsing of descriptors into a DynamicDeployer.
It has bug in that it will always overwrite the EjbJar and OpenejbJar originally in EjbModule.  Need to fix that.

author: dblevins
msg: refactored the deployment loader code a bit to split creation of the AppModule from parsing of the related xml files.
Still more work to be done here, but when done it will make it way easier to support several different converstion tools.
